app_detail:
Who Is Most Likely To (Whos most likely too) is the wildest party starter to play with your friends. This drinking game is one of the best in the world, and if you are looking to have a dirty party you have come to the right place!

Most Likely To Features:
- No ads, we hate them just as much as you do
- Tons of fun free content so you never run out Most Likely statements
- Casual game mode for playing with family and friends. Relaxed, simple and fun.
- Drinking game mode for parties and pre-parties. For those looking to get drunk.
- Super Hot game mode with dirty and sexy content for taking your party to the next level. (18+)

More info for Most Likely To:
The Super Hot category contains dirty statements. If you are looking for dirty or naughty game content this pack is ideal, but otherwise choose either Casual or Drinking. The dirty questions are sexy and exciting, but play at your own risk! You will get to know the naughty truth about your friends...
